metadata.name: Artisan Showcase Grid - Artisan Journey
metadata.description: Converted from HTML into repository JSON template format with brand variables and dynamic placeholders.

props.className: mt-4 text-xl md:text-2xl text-[var(--brand-text-secondary)] max-w-3xl mx-auto

children: {{content.basics.value || 'A vibrant tapestry of stories, skills, and creations from our featured artisans. Scroll to explore the journey.'}}

props.className: grid-cell lg:col-span-2 lg:row-span-2 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm p-8 rounded-lg shadow-lg flex flex-col justify-center

children: {{content.story.origin || 'We travel the globe to discover extraordinary artisans, each with a unique story etched into their craft. This is a celebration of their dedication, heritage, and the sheer beauty they create. From the raw material to the final masterpiece, every step is a testament to human creativity.'}}

props.className: text-xl italic text-[var(--brand-highlight)] border-l-4 border-[var(--brand-accent)] pl-4 py-2 mt-6

children: {{content.story.unique || '"Every knot, every color, every pattern tells a story of my ancestors. I'm just the storyteller." - Elara'}}

props.className: grid-cell group relative overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-lg lg:col-span-2 lg:row-span-2 min-h-[400px]
w-full h-full object-cover transition-transform duration-500 group-hover:scale-110
content-overlay absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/70 to-transparent flex items-end p-6
grid-cell bg-[var(--brand-primary)] text-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-xl

children: {{content.process.creation || 'Sourcing ethical, organic wool and sustainable materials is the foundation of our craft.'}}

props.className: grid-cell bg-[var(--brand-primary)] text-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-xl

children: {{content.process.materials || 'Hand-spinning the yarn, preparing the clay, or forging the metal with meticulous care.'}}

props.className: grid-cell bg-[var(--brand-primary)] text-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-xl

children: {{content.process.time || 'Weaving on a traditional loom, sculpting on the wheel, bringing the form to life.'}}

props.className: grid-cell bg-[var(--brand-primary)] text-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-xl

children: {{content.process.quality || 'Natural dyeing with plants & minerals, glazing and firing, polishing to perfection.'}}

props.className: grid-cell group relative overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-lg lg:col-span-2
w-full h-full object-cover transition-transform duration-500 group-hover:scale-105
w-full h-full object-cover transition-transform duration-500 group-hover:scale-105
content-overlay absolute inset-0 bg-black/50 flex items-center justify-center p-4 text-center
grid-cell group relative overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-lg lg:col-span-2
w-full h-full object-cover absolute top-0 left-0 transition-opacity duration-500 group-hover:opacity-0
content-overlay absolute inset-0 bg-black/70 flex flex-col justify-center items-center p-4 text-center

children: {{content.basics.value || 'Watch the magic of natural dyes come to life.'}}

props.className: grid-cell bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-sm p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg border-l-8 border-[var(--brand-terracotta)] lg:col-span-2

children: {{content.impact.testimonials[0] || '"My inspiration is the earth itself. The texture of the clay, the colors of the sunset... I try to capture that raw beauty in every piece. To see my work appreciated on a global stage is a dream come true."'}}

props.className: grid-cell text-center p-8 bg-[var(--brand-secondary)]/50 rounded-lg flex flex-col justify-center items-center shadow-lg lg:col-span-2
grid-cell group relative overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-lg lg:col-span-2 lg:row-span-2 min-h-[400px]

props.alt: {{content.lila.alt || 'Artisan working on a piece of jewelry'}}
props.className: w-full h-full object-cover transition-transform duration-500 group-hover:scale-110
content-overlay absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/80 to-transparent p-6 flex flex-col justify-end
text-[var(--brand-secondary)] text-lg max-h-0 opacity-0 group-hover:max-h-full group-hover:opacity-100 transition-all duration-500 ease-in-out mt-2

children: {{content.lila.desc || 'Forging stories in silver, inspired by ancient symbols and celestial patterns.'}}

props.className: grid-cell bg-[var(--brand-accent)] text-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-xl text-center flex flex-col justify-center items-center lg:col-span-2 lg:row-span-2

children: {{content.final.text || 'Each piece has a soul. Discover the one that speaks to you and support the artisans who pour their hearts into their work.'}}
